abstract: In recent weeks, viewers of TV networks like TCM were treated to numerous showings of a favorite holiday film, “Meet Me in St. Louis.” Now comes a campaign that acknowledges it is going to be awfully hard for a long time to meet anyone in St. Louis.

lead_paragraph: In recent weeks, viewers of TV networks like TCM were treated to numerous showings of a favorite holiday film, “Meet Me in St. Louis.” Now comes a campaign that acknowledges it is going to be awfully hard for a long time to meet anyone in St. Louis.

headline.main: Dig We Must for a Better St. Louis
